ROOT.QUERY: /***********************************************************************/ /* Query #2 : Qty receivred +/- 20% */ /***********************************************************************/ WITH QTE_RECEIVED AS ( SELECT ol_donord "Whs", ol_cproin || ''/'' || ol_ilogis || '' '' || ar_libpro "Item code desc", oe_fourn || '' '' || oe_librs "Supplier code desc", TRUNC(oe_datrec) "Receiving date", OL_NUMORC,ar_nuvcup, SUM(ol_qteuvc) "Ordered", ol_cproin, oe_ncdefo,oe_cincde, SUM(NVL(ol_uvcrec,0)) "Received" FROM tb_erec@heinens_stk_prod,tb_lrec@heinens_stk_prod, tb_art@heinens_stk_prod WHERE TRUNC(oe_datrec) = TRUNC(SYSDATE-1) AND oe_numorc=ol_numorc AND oe_donord=ol_donord AND (ol_depot= 92 - :param2) AND ol_cproin=ar_cproin AND ol_ilogis=ar_ilogis AND ol_donord=ar_donord AND ol_statut != 9 GROUP BY ol_donord, ol_cproin || ''/'' || ol_ilogis || '' '' || ar_libpro, oe_fourn || '' '' || oe_librs, ol_cproin, oe_ncdefo,oe_cincde, TRUNC(oe_datrec), OL_NUMORC, ar_nuvcup), QTE_RECEIVED_ORDERED AS ( SELECT "Whs", "Supplier code desc", "Item code desc", OL_NUMORC "AGRN num", "Receiving date", ar_nuvcup, (SELECT SUM(dcdqtei) FROM cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod WHERE dcdcexcde=oe_ncdefo AND dcdcincde=oe_cincde AND dcdcexr=ol_cproin) "Ordered Initial", (SELECT SUM(dcdqtec) FROM cdedetcde@heinens_custom_prod WHERE dcdcexcde=oe_ncdefo AND dcdcincde=oe_cincde AND dcdcexr=ol_cproin) "Ordered", "Received" FROM QTE_RECEIVED) SELECT "Whs", "Supplier code desc", "Item code desc", "AGRN num", to_char("Receiving date", ''MM/DD/RRRR'') "Receiving date", Round("Ordered"/ar_nuvcup,0) "Qty Init. Ord.", Round("Ordered"/ar_nuvcup,0) "Qty Ord.", Round("Received"/ar_nuvcup,0) "Qty Rec." FROM QTE_RECEIVED_ORDERED WHERE NVL("Received",0) != 0 AND ("Ordered"/"Received" > 1.2 OR 0.8 > "Ordered"/"Received") OR NVL("Received",0) = 0 ORDER BY "AGRN num" ASC, "Qty Rec." ASC
